page.title: 05THE VILLAGE CARNIVAL
page.content: On Saturday the 6th.July it was the village carnival.There were lots of floats,there was a castle,liquorice allsorts,there was cats and there was clowns and some minstrels.At the back of the floats was a big whale.One of the men in the band was later than he should have been so Mr.Thompson our headmaster played the big drum.They went all round the village and then they came to the school field.The black and white minstrels won the first prize. I did some countrty dancing and I had a go on the lucky dip.I watched the rounders.Mr.Simpson scored the most.Then mummy took me to the Spar for a lollipop.
